sets.tex: a template for set in latex
begin.tex: The template of a latex framework
picture.tex: A template for a titled-graph(using caption-of)

math_blocks.tex: The examples of math blocks in beamer
basic_column.tex: basic settings of 2 columns in beamer
fonts_size.tex: set the different size of text
font_family.tex: View all the font family beamer contains.

picture_and_text_side_by_side.tex: text in the left and picture in the right
enumtype.tex: using different types of enumeration types
hybrid_list.tex: create a hybrid list in beamer
text_settings.tex: add text settings(like bold, italized and underline)
wrapping_text.tex: add wrapping text around a image
basic_title_page.tex: classic template for create a titlepage
recurring_table_of_contents.tex: an example of recurring table of contents
